text:
The time-limited myth ends.
From the very beginning, they've lived in different worlds.

When the time came, the girl in the fairy tale left on her own,
leaving only a glass slipper behind as the bells rang.

She was asked from behind, 'At least tell me your name'—
But she simply left without leaving her name.

Farewell, for this was not my true self.
I was just deceiving all of you with a false appearance of my own.

We were born in different worlds, we live in different worlds.
We should not have misjudged the distance between us.

If you get close to the flames, it is only natural that you burn.
If you were to touch my original body, you too will be covered in ashes.

It's alright, I will continue to live alone, covered in ashes.
Because, I have always lived that way.

The dream will end with the midnight bell,
but I will live on, even if nothing is left in reality.

But, in that case, why did you—
why did you leave the glass slipper behind?

Chapter 5:
Bearing a Buried Fire

More than half of the opening day had passed,
and the time for the renewal ceremony was approaching.

After parting with their friends who went off to their staff duties,
[Player] and the remaining members were choosing souvenirs.

name: Red Hood
text:
Hey, Sandra, [Player], look, look—!
Don't you think Gurangatch would like this crunch chocolate?

name: Cinderella
text:
You...
Did you pick that just because
the words sound similar?

name: Red Hood
text:
Yeah? He popped into my mind the second I heard it!
I thought I'd give it to him when he joins us.

options.text: I think it's a great idea!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right? I'm sure he'll be happy,
and everyone else will laugh too!!

options.text: Isn't that a bit too simple...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
R-really!?
I thought it was a divine choice, though—!

options.text: Should we make that a fire brigade merchandise?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fire brigade merchandise...?
You mean as a PR measure?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: I remember that they used to sell MREs at that academy-prison.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: No, no, if we're going to do it, shouldn't we make it something more fire brigade-like...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahaha!
Sandra, you're overthinking it.

name: Cinderella
text:
...But to be honest, I have no idea
what to choose.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm sure something that doesn't last, like food or drinks,
would be good... But I'm not exactly confident in my choice.

As she says that, Cinderella looks around at the items
in the store and the other stores outside.

name: Red Hood
text:
To think Sandra would struggle with choosing souvenirs...
Haha, the gap between her usual self is kind of—

name: Cinderella
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">—What is it?

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Nothing at all!!

name: Cinderella
text:
...If I'm asked to do something, I'll do it as I'm told,
but I have no experience choosing and giving something myself.

name: Red Hood
text:
In that case, wouldn't it be fine to go with something
that someone else wrote 'recommended' on?

name: Red Hood
text:
There are a lot of recommended items in this sales floor alone.
It's less like one recommendation and more... like over 20. Haha.

options.text: Haha...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stop it!!
A dry laugh hurts the most!?

options.text: I can't decide either.
I just choose by intuition.

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm the type who gets
really indecisive.

name: Red Hood
text:
If it's food, they might have likes and dislikes,
and if it's merchandise, they might not need it...

name: Red Hood
text:
But Little Red Riding Hood says that the thought is what counts in a gift,
so I've decided not to think too deeply about it!

name: Cinderella
text:
...I see, I'd like to meet that
Little Red Riding Hood you recommend so much.

options.text: Why not ask the staff for recommendations?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-I see. That's true.
The staff at the sales floor would probably know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Excuse me, the clerk over there.
A souvenir for the fire brigade...
Ah, no, for a team—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nomad
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes! Recommended souvenirs for a large group!!
In that case, we have the perfect sweets or small item sets—

options.text: How about a different flavor of what I have?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, so we'll bring different kinds of the same sweets as souvenirs.
That might be a good idea.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: But the sweets you have, have so many kinds—!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nomad
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you having trouble, dear customer!?
In that case, how about this mixed box!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nomad
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you buy both Mix A and B, you'll have all the kinds.
It's perfect as a souvenir for a large group!

options.text: The one right in front of you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That's true, the food and drinks here were delicious.
Then the quality of the sweets should be good too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
And above all, it's simple and clear!
I guess I'll follow my subordinate's example here.
As she says that, Cinderella puts the sweets [Player] mentioned into her shopping basket.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, this one is limited edition?
And this one is a keychain set recommended for large groups—

name: Red Hood
text:
...Hey [Player], Sandra is putting a lot of stuff
in her shopping basket. She's buying a lot.

name: Red Hood
text:
If Sandra goes bankrupt because of this,
is it my fault for suggesting we buy souvenirs!?

Ignoring Red Hood's worries,
Cinderella puts the recommended items into her basket.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Oh, [Player], you.
Is that all you're getting for souvenirs?

name: Cinderella
text:
But, in your case, you'll need a lot, right?
Let's see, one, two, three, four... 23, no, just over 20, I guess.

As she says that, Cinderella points behind [Player]
and folds another finger.

name: Cinderella
text:
Oh, it's my turn at the register.
I'll go pay, so you can go ahead first.

A few minutes later, Cinderella returned
from the register with a cheerful face.

[Player] and Red Hood also finished their shopping,
and they decided to take a break at the terrace seats outside the store.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, I usually only shop for necessities,
but today's shopping trip was fun!

name: Cinderella
text:
I was recommended some 'strange souvenirs', so I bought them too.
I can't wait to see the faces of the firefighters when I give them.

name: Red Hood
text:
...I'm glad that you seem to be having fun.
Did you get a good souvenir, [Player]?

options.text: I got a good one!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's great!
There were a lot of sold-out items, weren't there?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I couldn't buy the one I wanted the most.
I'll aim for tomorrow's sales, but still...

options.text: The one I wanted was sold out...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's a shame...
Hey, I was able to buy that merchandise!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Here, have a souvenir from me.
There were only a few left, so I just picked it for some reason.

options.text: What about you, Red Hood?

name: Red Hood
text:
I've got souvenirs for the fire brigade
and everyone at the academy!
I'll give them as snacks for training.

name: Cinderella
text:
You bought some for the academy too?
Aren't you just as dutiful as ever, Reddy?

name: Cinderella
text:
When you first joined, you greeted everyone
and handed out sweets after your introduction.

name: Red Hood
text:
Because I wanted to get along with everyone quickly!?
And Grandma back home told me to bring snacks!!

name: Red Hood
text:
Well, the one who brought snacks to Grandma
was that Little Red Riding Hood over there.

options.text: Red Hood, your rookie days—
I'm a little curious.
Why did you join the fire department?

name: Cinderella
text:
Reddy's rookie days, huh.
As far as I've seen, he was full of motivation from the beginning.

name: Cinderella
text:
I met him on site, and the guy
charged in with his bare hands. Just like me.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ugh, hot, my fur is burning,
I want to run away...

name: Red Hood
text:
But there's someone who couldn't escape.
If I abandon them and something happens—

name: Red Hood
text:
—Then it'll be my fault for abandoning them!
I've changed my heart and my 'insides', haven't I!?

If possible, I want to stay away from dangerous things.
I'm done with a rough daily life like in the past.

—But if I run away by myself here,
I'll be breaking the 'promise' I've made in my hometown.

name: Red Hood
text:
I wonder if I can do something with my Rule.
But, the original wolf's power is useless here.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ah, screw it!! I'll just charge in.
I can probably manage it like when I blew away the straw and wooden houses!?

name: Ulaanbaatar
text:
Whoa there, little wolf, the only one who can charge in
without equipment is this super hot old lady, you know?

name: Cinderella
text:
Hmph, you seem to have a talent for rushing into a fire,
so it seems I'll have to teach you how to 'come back alive'.

options.text: You're two of a kind!
It was inevitable that you'd become buddies...
I've re-evaluated you, Reddy!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, right?
I get things done when I have to!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Wait a minute,
does that mean you were underestimating me...!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Reddy, I meant it as a compliment.
It takes courage to do something you can't do.

name: Cinderella
text:
I just happened to encounter a fire
and was asked to join, so I just did as I was told.

name: Cinderella
text:
I thought it was the same with your case.
Reddy, you're a full-fledged firefighter now.

name: Red Hood
text:
...........
Ah, no, I've never heard your story before, Sandra.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's not that big of a story.
Now, sorry for damping the mood.

name: Cinderella
text:
There's still time until the ceremony.
And no important messages have come in yet.

name: Cinderella
text:
The atmosphere has changed now that it's sunset,
so shall we go somewhere else since we have the chance?

options.text: That's what I'm talking about!
There's a place I want to go—
Cinderella asking us to play...!?

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra...
Invited us...!?

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm in the mood for it today. Come on, are you going,
or are you going back to the standby area?

[Player] and the others walk through the park,
illuminated by a sunset that seems unbelievable for an underground facility.

name: Red Hood
text:
Now, where should we go—!?
It's so big, we can't possibly see it all in one day.

name: Cinderella
text:
Certainly, in terms of playing around,
this place is a little too big.

options.text: I wonder how many Coin that took...
Perhaps to encourage repeating visits?
It's a size that Cinderella approves of.

name: Red Hood
text:
From that Sandra, to hear things like
'it's too big to go around'!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Just who do you think I am...?
I'm not just running around for no reason!

name: Cinderella
text:
Yes, it's too big to go around in one day.
And yet, the time of day changes, and the
impression of the scenery changes.

name: Cinderella
text:
It makes me regret not being able to see it with my own eyes.
Is this what Oscar meant by the desire to repeat?

name: Red Hood
text:
...I'm going to go pick some flowers!
Wait here, Sandra, [Player].

name: Cinderella
text:
...Right, [Player].
A souvenir from me to you, I'll give it to you now.

As she says, Cinderella hands [Player]
a bag with something in it.

When they unwrapped and took out the contents,
what was inside was a pair of shoes.

name: Cinderella
text:
The size should be perfect.
I was worried about the fire resistance of the shoes you're wearing now.

name: Cinderella
text:
Those are good, they didn't burn
in any fire I've been in. I'd vouch for them.

name: Cinderella
text:
I think I've trained Reddy and the Yatagarasu well,
but you... I couldn't teach you that much.

name: Cinderella
text:
So that you'll be fine whenever
I leave this place, haha.

name: Cinderella
text:
You're a firefighter...
Though a storm would be a much better term.

name: Cinderella
text:
I think you have the aptitude.
Probably, about the same as me.

options.text: Can I really have this, Cinderella?
This glass decoration is beautiful.
Don't say such ominous things!

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm back...
Huh? What's wrong, you two?

options.text: I got something nice!
No, it's nothing, Reddy.
Oh, isn't that over there—

name: Seth
text:
Oh, if it isn't you, [Player].
And the two from the fire brigade!

name: Hercules
text:
I am happy to see you again.
It has been a while since the first aid training and the attraction tour.

options.text: We finally met!
Are you two on break?
Is this your first time meeting my seniors?

name: Seth
text:
We just got off work, so we were just
walking around until the ceremony starts.

name: Hercules
text:
Yes. And when I saw you,
I thought I'd come over and say hello.

name: Hercules
text:
I haven't had a proper introduction with
the two of you from the fire brigade yet.

name: Red Hood
text:
You're the amazing duo when
we fought the shark, right!?

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm Red Hood.
And this is my buddy, Cinderella.

name: Cinderella
text:
Ah, nice to meet you, 'Hercules', 'Ash'.
It's quite an interesting sight to see you two together.

name: Hercules
text:
Yes, it is nice to meet you.
...Did I, just introduce myself?

name: Seth
text:
W-W-Wait, just now,
did you call me Ash...?

name: Hercules
text:
Yes, this friend's name is Seth.
Do you have an acquaintance who resembles him?

options.text: Are you familiar with Aaru?
Did I say something before?
Cinderella, are you acquainted with that many?

name: Cinderella
text:
Seth...? Ah, I see, I understand now.
I jumped to conclusions, nice to meet you two as well.

name: Cinderella
text:
I lived a little ahead of your time...
I must have been mistaken.

name: Red Hood
text:
Hey, we're free right now,
but we haven't decided where to go.

name: Red Hood
text:
Do you two have any plans
on where to go from here?

name: Seth
text:
O-Oh. We were just about
to head to an attraction.

name: Seth
text:
Wobbly floating island floats, a fountain arch,
and to top it off, a super huge waterslide.

name: Seth
text:
It's a parallel course, so I was going to race with Hercules!
Do you guys want to come too? The more the merrier, I'm sure!!

name: Hercules
text:
Yes, if you don't mind,
I'd like you to come with us as friends.

options.text: Please make it a gentle course!
The scenery must be different from the daytime.
I'll show you the power of the fire brigade!!

name: Cinderella
text:
...Alright, you guys go ahead.
I'll take a picture this time.

name: Red Hood
text:
Eh, you're not going to join us, Sandra?
You came with us when we were with everyone else.

options.text: Just taking pictures is enough, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You left me no choice.
Show me a good slide, alright?

options.text: A request from your last student.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...If you put it that way, I really have no other choice.
Honestly, I've given you an unnecessary promise.

options.text: Would you like to dance with me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...If it isn't the killing lines.
If that's what you are asking me, then it is my pleasure.

name: Cinderella
text:
But only for everything except the last waterslide.
Unfortunately, I don't have a swimsuit with me.

name: Red Hood
text:
Alright, [Player], don't think I'll go easy on
you just because you're my junior!?

name: Red Hood
text:
Whoa, you have to run across this floating island!?
There's no training or anything, so I have no idea what to do!!

name: Seth
text:
Heh, whether you're in the fire brigade or not, you're no match for me!
This Seth-sama is a hero known as the incarnation of the oasis, you know?

name: Hercules
text:
It would be rude to hold back against you.
I will face you with the momentum I had when
I cleaned the Augean stables in my hometown!
Battle Start

She rises from the ashes.
All who see it kneel and bow their heads.

People from all worlds alike
called her a 'miraculous being'.

And in order to partake in that miracle,
or to have her grant a miracle, people worship her.

She had the power to embody 'what everyone eventually desires most'.
The further the times progressed, the more people gathered.

After parting with [Player] and the others,
Cinderella waits at the slider's landing point.

In the meantime, other visitors are thrown
out of the lane one after another and land with a scream.

name: Cinderella
text:
...I'll fly over whenever I get an emergency call, but
is it really okay for me to be doing this?

It was really, really fun.
I spent the time as if I was under a spell.

name: Cinderella
text:
Cinderella... huh.
I've really grown to like this name now.

She said, and laughed.
A name is something that changes with place and time.

Just as the guardian of that oasis passed on his name to his sworn brother,
and that young Alcides changed his name to Hercules.

And, just like the wolf who calls himself 'Red Hood',
who became her buddy in this Tokyo.

name: Cinderella
text:
Unchanging, huh.
No, but, then this feeling is—

name: Cinderella
text:
...Oh, it's [Player] and the others.
I should do what I was asked to do.

[Player] and the others stand on the high platform
and are sucked into the water slider's pipe.

Following the slightly transparent shadow,
Cinderella readies her device.

And the moment they jumped out, she photographed it
with the accuracy of a judging camera at a sports tournament.

name: Cinderella
text:
Alright, got it!
This turned out pretty well, didn't it?

After checking the picture she took,
Cinderella smiles with satisfaction.

...Suddenly, a scene of herself mixed in
with the cheerful faces flashed through her mind.

—It was a similar feeling to the time of the 'game'
that suddenly started after the first aid training the other day.

name: Cinderella
text:
...I have to get a swimsuit.
Next time I come, I'll join in on the water slider.

She, who was called Cinderella, knows.
But... there is no promise to anyone that that time will come.

To greet her 'friends' who are coming up,
Cinderella hurries to the poolside.

Reluctantly, as if she was heading to a glamorous ball,
something like a flame was born inside her body.

Things break, people die.
And fire, is destined to go out eventually.

But, there are things that are 'not like that'.
For example, those whose stories are not told after 'happily ever after'.

For example, that ash-covered girl got happily married and—
Whatever happened after that, I wonder?

The Transient from the fairy world of Tír na nÓg,
Red Hood, is one of them.

He had a strong body, a terrifying face and a growl,
he was the 'wolf' that threatened, stole, and hurt the peaceful daily life.

Sometimes he targeted the pigs who had just built their houses,
and at other times he changed his voice and aimed for the young goats.

And at other times,
he was the 'wolf' who targeted the little girl in the red riding hood and her grandmother.

The end of such people is not told in detail.
At first, there may have been a clear 'end'.

Because as time goes on,
the consistency no longer matches the progress of the times.

Red Hood came to this Tokyo and met 'it',
and understood with his natural sense of smell.

Ah, this is the same as me.
An existence that was not given 'salvation'.

So, he became buddies with 'it'.
...Like beasts, licking each other's wounds.

name: Yuma
text:
—Ah, [Player], everyone!
Over here. Glad, could meet up.

name: Yuma
text:
Hogen and Shennong-sensei, Oscar too,
said, join us soon.

name: Red Hood
text:
Oh, by the way... Hey, hey.
Yuma-kun, are you done with your staff work?

name: Yuma
text:
Yeah. Am-sama's live show, special slot, can see.
So, shift, adjusted, so no overlap!

As the start of the ceremony approaches,
[Player] gathers with their friends again.

name: Red Hood
text:
So there's a commemorative live show, then a show,
and finally fireworks.

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right. People will be gathering at the venue, so it might be wise
for us to be near the venue.

options.text: We can evacuate them immediately if something happens.
We can legally watch the stage!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're not wrong.
But, I'd say, you could have put it a little differently—

options.text: Maybe you just want to watch the show.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hmph, I'll admit that your intuition is quite something, newbie.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: As long as you don't forget you're in the fire brigade, you can enjoy yourself with sufficient moderation and restraint—

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Yay!!

name: Red Hood
text:
...I mean.
We have to be prepared in case any trouble occurs!

name: Yuma
text:
How about, during fireworks?
Fire brigade, can see together too?

name: Cinderella
text:
That's fine.
The final check was done this morning, so we just have to watch.

Please, everyone, enjoy yourselves.
There will be a special large-scale fireworks and drone show on the first day!

name: Oscar
text:
Well, well, greetings.
Although, I did have the pleasure of your company during the day, didn't I?

name: Oscar
text:
The work I need to do is limited now,
so I decided to join you early.

name: Oscar
text:
I could have stayed in the special seats, but I wanted to experience
the excitement of the scene, which is different from a theater, and also—

name: Oscar
text:
—And also, because I want to be by your side,
so would you allow me, my dear swallow?

options.text: Alright, alright.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah...
That attitude, it is as if you're pecking me with your beak.
To me, it is sweeter than the nectar of flowers.

options.text: You're being glib again.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah...
That attitude, it is as if you're pecking me with your beak.
To me, it is sweeter than the nectar of flowers.

options.text: I've been waiting for you...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: It seems I've made you lonely by being too charming, my apologies.

name: Red Hood
text:
[Player] is being
courted by Oscar-san!?

name: Yuma
text:
O-Oscar!
Don't, hog [Player], all to yourself...

name: Red Hood
text:
I-I have to protect my junior
from being eaten by another wolf.

Oh, what an expected popularity.
Of course, it is my very Master who has captivated me.

name: Hakumen
text:
Greetings, everyone. And you too, my dear Master!!
I'm glad to see you're enjoying yourselves.

options.text: Oh, right, you were the owner.
Are you undercover?
I'm so glad to finally meet you, Hakumen-chan!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hakumen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ufufufu...
My apologies, I couldn't possibly wait to see you either, but I had a mountain of tasks to do.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hakumen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I slipped out when I had a chance.
Please allow me to invite you on a vacation with me another day.

name: Hakumen
text:
Oh, do I see a familiar face?
Wait, the flame of the Fire Cloud Cave... G-gyaah!?

name: Shennong
text:
Oh, I was wondering who it was,
but you're as active as ever, Millennium Fox Spirit-dono.

options.text: Oh, are you two acquainted?
Oh, right, you two don't get along...

name: Shennong
text:
Well, as an immortal from the same generation,
I've heard a lot about your recent activities.

name: Hakumen
text:
Let me tell you, I still haven't acknowledged
that you're called the successor to Nüwa-sama!?

name: Cinderella
text:
...History repeats itself, huh.
Every generation has its own set of problems.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, well, my dear client.
It's an honor to have you come in person.

name: Hakumen
text:
Hmph... Ahem, excuse me?
I've shown you something unsightly, dear Master.

name: Hakumen
text:
The CEO of the Flaming Mountains also wanted to come,
but he has a speech at the ceremony later, so...

name: Hakumen
text:
Oh, right, it's a bit late to say this, but
you were the ones to take care of the commotion before the opening, didn't you?

name: Hakumen
text:
Both Gyumao-chan and I would like
to express our heartfelt gratitude.

name: Hakumen
text:
Well then, Oscar-chan. In my stead,
please continue to entertain my Master and their friends.

Hakumen bows and gracefully turns her back,
disappearing into the crowd.

...A few seconds later, a staff member in a black suit
walked past, looking for something in a hurry.

name: Red Hood
text:
T-T-T-That was the most important
person in this facility? Right...?

name: Cinderella
text:
It seems so.
You have a lot of 'faces', don't you, [Player]?

name: Red Hood
text:
Hey, you should say 'wide circle of friends', right?
You're getting old, Sandra...
Eek, I'm sorry!?

options.text: I have 100 friends.
It's not like I did anything.
Not as much as you, Cinderella.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right...
If you're talking about popularity, then I suppose so.

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha!
Longevity and popularity are two different things, my disciple?

name: Hogen
text:
I met him on the way. By the way...
I heard you're famous as a problem child at school?

name: Shennong
text:
He's a good talker for a self-proclaimed grand master,
so I accidentally let it slip. It's all true, though?

options.text: No, it's Shennong's own misunderstanding.
I'm aware that I'm a problem child myself.
Yes, let's wrap this conversation up!

name: Cinderella
text:
...You're popular!
I don't know if that's a happy thing, though.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ah, when I'm having fun with humans like this,
it somehow reminds me of 'that child'.

name: Yuma
text:
Red Hood, 'that child',
from before, story. 'Little Red Riding Hood'?

options.text: I think I heard that the other day.
Is it related to that 'hood'?
Could it be, your lover...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
N-N-No!!
A big, scary wolf like me, and such a pure and lovely...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Please continue.
It seems like it would be a good reference for my next script.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's just a misunderstanding!!
No, it's not like I hate her or anything!!

name: Red Hood
text:
There's no doubt that she's a special person.
She's an irreplaceable child to me.

name: Red Hood
text:
Well, I guess I shouldn't be saying that
with the mouth that ate her.

name: Red Hood
text:
But the hunter replaced the contents of my stomach
and took her out, so we have a 'happily ever after'!

options.text: So that child is alive.
You lived through that well, Red Hood...
It's a 'truly scary fairy tale'...!

name: Red Hood
text:
Well, I'm not sure if I'm alive
in the same way as before, though!

name: Red Hood
text:
...But in this Tokyo, I've realized that
someone like me is not alone.

name: Cinderella
text:
That's right, Reddy. You're doing great.
You still need a lot of training to catch up with me, though?

name: Red Hood
text:
S-Sandra...
Uuuu, I'm so happy.

options.text: I don't really understand what you're talking about, but...
Anyway, I'm glad you're happy.

name: Oscar
text:
Ah, a heart-wrenching past, but to a strong
way of life, wouldn't that be the best story ever!

name: Shennong
text:
Is that exaggerated impression
a so-called occupational hazard...?

name: Shennong
text:
To accidentally talk about something dark,
doesn't that mean you trust us... and are off-guard?

name: Shennong
text:
It seems that training was useful,
so I'm happy too.

Red Hood laughs like he has lost all his strength.
After a brief silence, Hogen opens his mouth.

name: Hogen
text:
In the Land of Wa, fireworks are sometimes set off as an offering
to shrines and temples. Along with a wish.

name: Red Hood
text:
Wow... I heard it's more amazing than the demo,
so I was looking forward to it, but a wish...

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm getting a little nervous.
But maybe I'm even more excited.

name: Yuma
text:
Wish... Hadn't, thought of.
But, might have, something, to wish for.

name: Red Hood
text:
Then let's make a wish together!
I hope they all come true.

options.text: As long as it's fun, that's all that matters.
With that person I'm interested in...
I still want a lot of Coin...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, [Player], your desires are overflowing from your stomach...
Shall I have them replaced?

name: Cinderella
text:
It's a strange thing.
To make a wish on something like that.

name: Oscar
text:
It's like a good luck charm.
Even if it seems pointless, something might happen if you try.

name: Cinderella
text:
I see...
It might be interesting to find meaning in that.

name: Cinderella
text:
I've come to want to see it for myself.
Tonight's fireworks are your special work, aren't they—?

At those words, Oscar's lips curled into a smile,
and just as he took a deep breath and was about to speak.

name: Mysterious Voice
text:
—Welcome to T.S.L.!!
To all our visitors, are you enjoying the tropical paradise of Tokyo!?

Along with a rumbling sound effect, a familiar voice
echoed from the park's speakers.

And the artificial mountain in the park suddenly erupted in a spectacular explosion,
and in time with that, a huge figure leaped onto the stage.

name: Gyumao
text:
Hahahaha!!
From the owner of this park, a heartfelt thanks to all of you for coming!!

options.text: As usual...!
It's erupting!!
Did we do a safety check on that?

name: Oscar
text:
The volcano was a strong request from the client.
The Crafters contributed greatly to its design and construction.

name: Cinderella
text:
The inspection has been done thoroughly?
But, Reddy wanted to keep it a secret from you, so.

name: Red Hood
text:
I wanted to surprise you, [Player].
You're here using up your summer vacation,
so I wanted you to enjoy it as much as possible—
<p2 style="font-size: 150%">Ohohohohoho!!

name: Hakumen
text:
And from me, the co-owner and facility owner, as well.
My love and thanks to everyone, I'll be very generous to you all tonight!!

name: Shennong
text:
...I expected her to come,
but she's as gorgeous as ever.

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha!
It's a special vacation, so we have to go all out, don't we?

A flashy moving light illuminates Hakumen,
and with that as a signal, the ceremony began.

name: Cinderella
text:
What's wrong, Hogen.
That volcano won't erupt so many times—

options.text: (Look at the volcano)
The smoke is still coming out.
Is that also part of the show?

name: Shennong
text:
...You're right, there's still smoke coming out.
And I can see a little red light, but what is this...?

name: Oscar
text:
The smoke should stop soon.
Could it be, there's some trouble—

An alert sound rings from the devices of [Player],
the fire brigade, and Oscar.

options.text: This is an emergency call!
You've got to be kidding me...!?
(Look at the message)

name: Red Hood
text:
Explosion and fire in warehouses C and D of the work area under the volcano,
E next door is safe for now, but the fireworks are stored there—

name: Cinderella
text:
I have the map in my head.
I'm heading straight to there!!

name: Oscar
text:
Please wait a second.
It's a long way to the work area by the front route.

As he says that, Oscar taps the ground with his cane.
Then, the house that was an object nearby lights up.

name: Oscar
text:
The inside of the house is connected to an underground passage for work.
I've unlocked all the locks with my authority, so please use it!

name: Oscar
text:
It's only the work area for now.
The visitors and staff in other areas—

name: Cinderella
text:
OK, I get it, time is of the essence.
Don't worry, I won't let a single spark fly to your ideal paradise!!

name: Shennong
text:
A request for cooperation has come to the first aid team.
That means there are injured people, so I'm going too.

name: Hogen
text:
I was off duty, but I can't overlook
it since I'm here!

name: Yuma
text:
Me too, me too!
[Player], leave it to me!!

[Player] rushes to the scene
through the underground passage.

Cinderella runs at the front with her usual speed,
and the other members follow suit.

name: Yuma
text:
Smell, of smoke.
Getting, closer...!

name: Red Hood
text:
Yuma-kun... Did you take my fur
for this kind of use—

name: Red Hood
text:
This isn't the time for that!
But still, this smoke smells like fuel...

name: Oscar
text:
The site is the fuel storage for the volcano eruption,
and a temporary warehouse for the fireworks echo countermeasure construction.

name: Oscar
text:
However, there is no problem with the volcano system itself.
A fire suddenly breaking out from a warehouse,
that should have had perfect countermeasures...?

name: Hogen
text:
Could it be that the slimes that had infiltrated
before the opening were not all of them...?

name: Yuma
text:
I might, know.
If assume, slimes, with same fire attribute—

name: Yuma
text:
Hid, in mountain.
With eruption just now, maybe changed, to fire—

name: Shennong
text:
If that's the case, wouldn't that be bad!?
If the slimes start moving around...

name: Cinderella
text:
We have to hurry, no matter what.
We have to prevent the damage from spreading at all costs!!

Cinderella speeds up even more.
With an impatience that goes beyond fulfilling her duty.

The impatience that the time with her friends, which she had come to enjoy,
might disappear, drives her—

The closer they approach the warehouse mentioned in the message,
the more obvious the rising in the room's temperature is.

What they saw, was a red light and
several staff members at a loss.

The warehouse ahead was burning fiercely,
and it looked like it would spread to the adjacent side at any moment.

name: Cinderella
text:
—What happened!?
With this kind of spread, what on earth did it catch fire from?

name: Staff
text:
E-Everyone...
I think the lubricating oil and fuel for the eruption were stored there...

name: Staff
text:
But it shouldn't have caught fire
unless it reached a very high temperature, so why...

name: Staff
text:
A-Anyway, it's a fuel fire, so
we couldn't activate the sprinklers...

name: Cinderella
text:
That was a good decision.
Oscar, wasn't the disaster prevention equipment I heard about beforehand—

name: Oscar
text:
Ah. All the doors are fireproof.
It's also possible to close and seal them. If we use up all the oxygen—

name: Staff
text:
Please wait...! We were in the middle of working.
There are still three staff members...
We're still getting replies to our chat!

name: Shennong
text:
Inside here...!?
Can we even manage with fireproof equipment...?

name: Red Hood
text:
This level is too dangerous without the full equipment!
But I don't know if we can make it in time even if we prepare...

name: Red Hood
text:
And maybe not all the combustibles ignited at once.
If they reach their ignition point with a time lag from now...

name: Hogen
text:
An explosion during the rescue...
That's also a possibility.

options.text: But we have no choice, right?
It doesn't look like we have time to wait.
Cinderella, can't you do something?

name: Cinderella
text:
My power is strong against flames...
But it doesn't work on flames that I didn't create, so I can't put this out.

name: Cinderella
text:
If they were nearby, I could wrap them in my flames
and protect them— But there are three of them.

name: Cinderella
text:
If they all can't walk, I can't carry them all by myself.
However, I can't let Reddy and the others charge in without equipment—

name: Cinderella
text:
No, there's no time to think. You guys get the equipment ready.
I'll try to rescue them as I am—

name: Yuma
text:
Everyone, I, gathered, nearby fire extinguishers!
Trained, so, know how to use.

name: Yuma
text:
And this, fireproof cloth.
For now, bring along.

name: Hogen
text:
Don't forget about me, you know?
This level of flame is nothing compared to a tengu's training.

name: Oscar
text:
I've arranged for the Assistant Shark
to carry the fireproof equipment.

name: Oscar
text:
In return, I'll take on the role of the evacuation guide,
which will be vacant. I also know the map, you see?

name: Oscar
text:
But I can't cover it all by myself.
One more person... somebody to guide me through.

name: Yuma
text:
...!! I, will do.
Evacuation training, did, so surely, can do.

name: Shennong
text:
...I'd really want to stop you, [Player].
But if lives are lost no matter how it turns out...

name: Cinderella
text:
I won't expose anyone other than the firefighting university students to real danger.
However, as much as I'm really sorry, I still need your help.

options.text: I've had the training.
Shennong, please take care of the rescue afterwards.
(Wrap yourself in the fireproof cloth)

name: Shennong
text:
I'll come after you when the fireproof equipment arrives.
Until then, please be safe.

name: Red Hood
text:
My hood is also fire resistant,
so I should be able to manage with just this!

name: Red Hood
text:
If we make a path with the fire extinguishers
Yuma-kun brought, we might be able to do something!

Not just her juniors in the fire brigade,
but even those outside of it are trying to cooperate as if it's a matter of course.

Even if they are powerless alone,
if they gather, they might be able to do something—

name: Cinderella
text:
—Ah, even in a situation like this.
My heart seems to be dancing at the fact that I'm not alone.

name: Cinderella
text:
Alright, I'll go first and make a path.
Reddy and [Player], you will handle the rescue.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'll give you two my smoke-proof handkerchiefs.
It's for the rescued, but this time you two will cover your noses and mouths with it.

Cinderella hands the handkerchiefs to the two of them and
looks around at her friends who have not received firefighter training.

name: Cinderella
text:
You've got good eyes, worthy of my squad members.
In that case, I'll have you dance with me until the end.

name: Cinderella
text:
Hogen, I need you to secure
our escape route with a fire extinguisher.

name: Cinderella
text:
No matter how good you are, in this situation,
the trained [Player] would be more suitable for rescue.

name: Cinderella
text:
The other three,
you can do as you were talking about over there.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Let's end this situation quickly
and get back to the ceremony!

name: Cinderella
text:
Now, are you ready?
Ash-covered ones, to your positions!!
Battle Start

name: Visitor
text:
Doesn't it smell burnt?
The smoke from the volcano hasn't stopped...

name: Visitor
text:
They're setting off fireworks underground,
so I'm sure it's fine—

name: Visitor
text:
—Did something explode?
Is it part of the show before the ceremony or something...?

name: Visitor
text:
It must be a signal for the fireworks.
I hear there's a special, extravagant fireworks display today, right?

In the middle of the ceremony. In the work area,
rescue operations by [Player] and the others were underway.

Cinderella leads the way, clearing obstacles,
with Red Hood and [Player] following behind.

They used fire extinguishers to force their way
through the flames that were in their way.

name: Red Hood
text:
[Player], are you alright? Sandra's flames are protecting us from the heat.
Don't wander off, okay!!

name: Cinderella
text:
...To still be alive in this scene, there must be a species
that is strong against fire, like me. A blessing in disguise.

options.text: This is scary...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...If push comes to shove, [Player], I'll use my power to get you guys out, so don't worry.

options.text: We have to find them before we get burned by the heat.
I think I heard a voice!

text:
Firefighter...
Over... Over here...

Perhaps they had received the information on their device,
a faint voice was calling for help.

options.text: Slime...!
So there were some that escaped that time.
(Get into a fighting stance)

name: Red Hood
text:
I don't want to fight
in a place like this—!?

name: Staff
text:
N-No, that's not it...!
These guys, they've been suppressing the fire...

name: Cinderella
text:
...It's hard to believe, but if that's not the case,
there's no explanation for how they're safe in this fire.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Did it ignite and rupture again?
That means the fire might get more intense.

name: Cinderella
text:
This is not the time to be surprised.
First, we all need to get out of here.

options.text: Got it, let's get out of here quickly.
I hope we have enough fire extinguishers.
(Lend a shoulder to the person in need of rescue)

text:
It's a difficult task to walk while extinguishing a fire and
carrying a person in need of rescue who can't walk properly due to injury and fatigue.

As they slowly head for the exit,
the sound of ruptures echoed from all over the warehouse.

name: Cinderella
text:
...If it were just me, I would have been out by now.
But I probably couldn't have carried everyone at once.

name: Red Hood
text:
Eh, what, did you say something!?
I can't hear you—

options.text: That impact seemed bad.
The shelves are falling like dominoes...!
(Walk as fast as possible)

text:
It seems that several combustibles had ignited.
Multiple explosion sounds rang out, and the vibration of the air traveled through their bodies.

One of the large shelves in the warehouse fell due to the impact, and as a result,
they started to fall one after another towards [Player] and the others like dominoes.

name: Red Hood
text:
Guh... If it comes to this, it's all or nothing.
I'll hold it entirely with my fireproof equipment—

name: Cinderella
text:
This is my first time rescuing someone in the middle of an explosion.
If I had charged in alone, I wouldn't have been able to save everyone.

name: Cinderella
text:
Thank you for covering for me, everyone.
Please tell the guys outside that for me.

name: Cinderella
text:
—Well then, Reddy!
Take care of this person too!!

Faster than Red Hood could react,
Cinderella pushes the person she was carrying onto him.

And with a force unimaginable from her arms,
she shoves [Player], Red Hood, and the rescued person.

options.text: What, what just happened...?
(Get up immediately)

name: Staff
text:
The firefighter who was carrying me...!
Under the... under the shelf—

name: Red Hood
text:
—Get up, I'll carry you two!
It's collapsing, we have to hurry!!

Red Hood shouted with a voice that was not drowned out by the sound of the collapsing shelves.
The heat, hot enough to make the skin tingle, came through the fireproof cloth.

Cinderella's protection was gone.
Sweat broke out, and a feeling of sluggishness as if their weight had doubled attacked them.

options.text: It's hot, which means...
(Stop as you reach your limit)
(Gather your strength and start walking)

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], throw away, fire extinguisher, lighter!
Leave, path-making, to me, hurry—

name: Shennong & Hogen
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Over here...!!

Shennong and Hogen appear,
holding fire extinguishers and protective cloths.

And being pulled by the two of them,
[Player] and the others escaped.

name: Red Hood
text:
—Escape, and rescue of the person
in need of rescue, complete!!

name: Oscar
text:
—Understood.
Closing the area of the accident on my authority,
and emergency release of extinguishing gas!

name: Yuma
text:
Cinderella, hasn't, come out, yet.
Gas, can't release, yet...!

name: Oscar
text:
...I fully understand.
But in this situation, this is my role to play.

As he answers, Oscar presses the control panel
near the door with his cane.

The door closes with a buzzer,
and non-flammable gas is released—

name: Red Hood
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">...Sandra!!
